API Specification Errors
Errors in Class: org.haldean.chopper.server.Debug


Category 4: Text/Link Error

Class Debug
  • Html Error in First Sentence
    --Missing a period 
A class to write debug information to an updatable,  and optionally to write it to standard error













enable







    

  • Html Error in First Sentence


    
--Missing a period




Set to true to enable debugging, or false to supress  output (defaults to false)













setDebugOut(Updatable)







    

  • Html Error in First Sentence


    
--Missing a period




Set the component to update with debug messages













log(String)







    

  • Html Error in First Sentence


    
--Missing a period




Log a debug message












Explanation of Columns





Left Column

Identifies the error or warning.

Right Column

Shows the comment-text that generated the error in red.



Displays a template you can cut and paste in black.
